item.name: Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 7,489 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 148,376 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 8,694. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 87,338 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
